''partition editor'', ''partitioner'', and ''partitioning utility'' are all synonyms for a computer utility program used to view, create, alter, and delete [[Partition (computing)|disk partitions]] on a computer storage device, most commonly a [[hard disk]], but often a [[USB flash drive]] stick or other storage medium.
+
''partition editor'', ''partitioner'', and ''partitioning utility'' are all synonyms for a computer utility program used to view, create, alter, and delete [[Partition (computing)|disk partitions]] on a computer storage device, most commonly a [[hard disk]], but often a [[USB flash drive]] or other storage medium.
A ''partition'' is a section or segment of the storage space on a storage device. By partitioning a large device into several partitions it is possible to isolate various types of data from one another, and allow the coexistence of two or more operating systems simultaneously.
A ''partition'' is a section or segment of the storage space on a storage device. By partitioning a large device into several partitions it is possible to isolate various types of data from one another, and allow the coexistence of two or more operating systems simultaneously.
